hurting people there.

1398.83.text:
John: I want to look at you
right now.

1400.67.text:
If your marriage is under
attack, let me tell you, this

1402.94.text:
attack can be thrusted, it can
be stopped.

1404.70.text:
And so I want to pray for you
right now.

1406.61.text:
In the name of Jesus Christ of
Nazareth whom I belong to, whom

1410.51.text:
I serve who has changed my
marriage, I speak to the demonic

1414.65.text:
forces that have attacked this
marriage and I break the power

1417.98.text:
of those forces, and I call for
strife and division to leave

1423.42.text:
I release forgiveness into this
marriage and I release the hope

1427.59.text:
that is in Christ Jesus into
this marriage.

1429.53.text:
In Jesus' name, I command all
opposition, every word that's

1437.17.text:
I break the power of those words
and I release the Word of God

1441.44.text:
that says, there will be a
miracle, there will be a fusing

1445.34.text:
together of the hearts and souls
in this marriage, in the name of

1453.39.text:
Sid: I have a word from God for
you.

1678.24.text:
Sid: Next week on
It's Supernatural!

1682.15.text:
The Bible says the Temple will
be rebuilt.

1695.43.text:
Your gifts to this ministry will
help Sid air It's Supernatural

1699.26.text:
in Israel 28 times a week and
distribute his evangelistic book
